body:
# Steps to reproduce


# Actual behavior

```none
Failures with:

Expected exactly $null, but got @(@{InputObject=System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.dll; SideIndicator=<=}, @{InputObject=System.Runtime.Serialization.Primitives.dll; SideIndicator=<=}).
```

title: Validate start of console host.No new assemblies are loaded fails on Linux on RC.1 build
